t: Context manifest system and compile-context.sh manifest support

d: Created config/context-manifest.json with 17 roles: 11 base + 6 new (documenter, fe-security, ux-security, fe-documenter, ux-documenter). Each role defines files, artifacts, fields, budget, and optional includes.

Added get_manifest_config(), get_manifest_budget(), get_manifest_artifacts(), get_manifest_files(), get_manifest_field_filter() helpers to compile-context.sh. Manifest resolution via CLAUDE_PLUGIN_ROOT with graceful degradation when absent.

Updated get_budget() to try manifest-first via get_manifest_budget(), falling through to hardcoded case block. Added fe-security (3000), ux-security (2000), documenter/fe-documenter/ux-documenter (2000) to fallback cases.

Added documenter case block to compile-context.sh emitting files_to_document from summary.jsonl fm field, code-review highlights, and conventions. fe-security/ux-security route through existing security case with department-aware header. Updated valid roles list in error message.
